member.name: IAccessibleObject.SetAccessibleName
member.summary: Sets text that is retrieved by which accessibility tools use to obtain the Name Property of an object.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string containing the name.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAccessibleObject
member.summary: Exposes a method that can be used by an accessibility application.
